remarks: An equivalence for class substitution in the spirit of ~ df-clab .  Note that ` x ` and ` A ` don't have to be distinct.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Nov-2008.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
statement:
sbc7 $p |- ( [. A / x ]. ph <-> E. y ( y = A /\ [. y / x ]. ph ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d ph y $.
$d x y $.
